description.mekanismaddons.dihydrogen_mo: Negates the slowness caused when mining while underwater.
description.mekanismaddons.atmospheric_a: Negates the slowness caused when mining while in the air.
description.mekanismaddons.capturing_uni: Gives a chance to drop spawn eggs when killing mobs.
description.mekanismaddons.aoe_unit: Allows the Meka-Tool to hit/mine in a configurable area of effect.
description.mekanismaddons.ambulation_ac: Increases walking speed as opposed to sprinting speed.
description.mekanismaddons.ignition_reta: Uses Sodium to protect the wearer from fire damage.
description.mekanismaddons.digital_stora: Allows you to link your Meka-Tool to your digital storage solution for wireless access.
upgrade.mekanism.luck.description: Gives a small chance to double the processing output.
